title: Comment on Bunbury reveals 2017 lineup: Muse, Death Cab For Cutie, The Shins, and more by Bunbury reveals 2017 lineup: Muse, Death Cab For Cutie, The Shins, and more - Dreammy Blog
text:
Reddit 
Bunbury has revealed its 2017 lineup. The three-day music festival goes down June 2nd – 4th takes place Sawyer Point and Yeatman’s Cove in downtown Cincinnati. 
The lineup includes Muse, Bassnectar, Pretty Lights, Death Cab For Cutie, The Shins, 30 Seconds to Mars, AFI, D.R.A.M., and San Fermin. 
Also playing are Wiz Khalifa, G-Eazy, The 1975, Flogging Molly, MuteMath, Tech N9ne, Moon Taxi, Reverend Horton Heat, Arkells, Civil Twilight, and July Talk, among others. 
Three-day and VIP tickets are on sale through the festival’s website.
